text: D Neppa id Isrusun aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen yal im$an. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tizzegzewt. Nessuffu$ ed yissen iâaqqayen mbabben, iguza n ppmeô id ipûubbun si tezdayin, leonanat n tfeôôant, uzemmur, n ôemman, ppemcabin ne$ ur ppemcabin. Walit ppemôa nnsen mi d teffe$ tebbwa. Ih, deg waya, war ccekk, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen.
